DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy safety investigational device , RPM , non-absorbable polypropylene mesh make D Med , correction Nasolabial fold . Study hypothesis - level significance : alpha=0.05 ( two-side ) - power test : ( power= 1-beta ) , power=0.08 - H0 : P equal P0 - H1 : P unequals P0 - The difference change WSRS ( Wrinkle Severity Rating Scale ) pre post rhytidectomy baseline 7week administration 0.237 ( P-P0= 0.237 )
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety Nasolabial Fold After Rhytidectomy Using Non-absorbable Mesh
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Benefits - enhance self-satisfaction quality life improve skin elasticity correct fold nasolabial fold area 2 . Risks - erythema , swell , pain redness facial area generally resolve 1 week 3.Duration study - entire duration : approximate 36weeks - Follow-up period : 7 week - Enrollment period : 12 week 4. study design - 2 step operation process - First step- insert polypropylene mesh skin - Second step- pull polypropylene mesh 3 week later
DOC.criteria: Subjects soft tissue sag around nasolabial fold Female age 30 65 , grade 3 4 nasolabial fold Wrinkle severity Rating Scale ( WSRS ) Subjects voluntary decide participate study sign informed consent Subjects skin disease face Subjects severe facial skin disease Subjects constantly take anticoagulant include aspirin Subjects thin thick skin Subjects systemic disease uncontrolled high blood pressure , diabetes , heart disease Subjects allergy nonabsorbable material . Subjects take immune suppressant General weakness status Pregnant lactate woman Subjects asthma , cancer , AIDS , Cystic fibrosis , Immobility cilia syndrome , leukopenia , Immunoglobulin deficiency , active infectious disease , serious liver renal disease , Subjects history dermal augmentation surgery permanent implant ( e.g . silicone , SoftformÂ® ) face Subjects participate clinical trial within 30 day screen
